document_data.mainbody:
elihands Maskar was a stablemaster inhabiting Waterdeep, the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Belihands was the guildmaster for the Stablemasters & Farriers Guild circa 1357 DR. He held the title of "Senior Master" within the guild and worked out of the Guild Paddockâ€”their headquarters on Walltower Walk in the Trades Ward.
